title: 2 BD/2 BA + Den (can be used as bdroom) & Terrace! No Fee+1 Free Rent
posting_body: ['2 BD/2 BA + Den (can be used as bdroom) & Terrace!', 'No Fee+1 Free Rent', 'Sara Lebbos', 'Phone: 347-753-0776', 'Mobile: 347-753-0776', 'Fax: 212-227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'Listing 'NO FEE', 'Eat In Kitchen', 'Walk In Closet', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Free Rent', 'The luxury 2 bedroom, 2 full bathrooms plus Den (can be experienced as a third bedroom) and a massive privet wrap-around terrace is the perfect place to call home.', 'The kitchen displays State-of-the-art kitchen appliances, luxurious finish and is open to the spacious living/dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows.', 'The Primary bedroom features a walk-in closet and En Suite bathroom for your convenience!', 'Both bathrooms contain marble floors with illuminated vanity mirrors.', 'Unit also includes a washer/dryer and ample closet spaces throughout.', 'The new development includes luxury amenities such as a resident Screening Room, open-air rooftop complete with a Sky Lounge, outdoor pool, and 360-degree views stretching from the Manhattan skyline to Rockaway Beach.', 'Situated in prime Prospect Heights, you’re minutes from epic culture and culinary fare in every direction, including historic landmarks like the Brooklyn Academy of Music and dynamic new destinations like Barclays Center.', 'Add to that 10 train lines one block away, and really, you can go anywhere you want from here.', 'Conveniently located near shopping restaurants and food markets!', 'Sara Lebbos', 'Phone: 347-753-0776', 'Mobile: 347-753-0776', 'Fax: 212-227-1120', 'Email: <URL>',
